scripts.db: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.undo_db: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.reset_db: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
